The situation in Egypt appeared rather more quietthan a few months ago, but he thought that nevetholess the V7arOffice would be unwilling to release any Air units from the^egypt/tiangarrison, as these were the minimum considered necessary until thesituation became more defined. Out of the two Squadrons in mesopotamia and Persia one could only regard about one third of the aeroplanesas being available for operations.
